mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EKA.LST_SPICA_FORM (LSPC_FORM_TYPE, LSPC_FORM_DESCRIPTION, LSPC_FORM_SOURCE, LSPC_FORM_PRIMARY_ATTRIBUTE, LSPC_FORM_CREATED_DATE, LSPC_FORM_CREATED_BY, LSPC_FORM_FLAG_ACTIVE) VALUES ( #{lspc_form_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_form_description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_form_source, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_form_primary_attribute, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{lspc_form_created_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1 )

INSERT INTO EKA.LST_SPICA_FIELD (LSPC_FORM_ID, LSPC_FIELD_NAME, LSPC_FIELD_TYPE, LSPC_FIELD_NULLABLE, LSPC_FIELD_CREATED_DATE, LSPC_FIELD_CREATED_BY, LSPC_FIELD_FLAG_ACTIVE) SELECT #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, A.COLUMN_NAME, A.DATA_TYPE, A.NULLABLE, SYSDATE, #{lspc_field_created_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1 FROM ALL_TAB_COLS A WHERE OWNER = 'EKA' AND A.TABLE_NAME = #{lspc_form_source, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.COLUMN_ID IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM EKA.LST_SPICA_FIELD B WHERE B.LSPC_FIELD_NAME = A.COLUMN_NAME AND LSPC_FORM_ID = #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER} ) ORDER BY COLUMN_ID

INSERT INTO EKA.LST_SPICA_VARIABLE (LSPC_FORM_ID, LSPC_VARIABLE_NAME, LSPC_VARIABLE_TYPE, LSPC_VARIABLE_EXPRESSION, LSPC_VARIABLE_DESCRIPTION, LSPC_VARIABLE_CREATED_DATE, LSPC_VARIABLE_CREATED_BY, LSPC_VARIABLE_FLAG_ACTIVE) VALUES ( #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lspc_variable_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_variable_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_variable_expression, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_variable_description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{lspc_variable_created_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1 )

INSERT INTO EKA.LST_SPICA_RULE (LSPC_FORM_ID, LSPC_RULE_NAME, LSPC_RULE_DESCRIPTION, LSPC_RULE_EXPRESSION, LSPC_RULE_ERROR_MSG, LSPC_RULE_CREATED_DATE, LSPC_RULE_CREATED_BY, LSPC_RULE_FLAG_ACTIVE, LSPC_RULE_PREREQUISITES, LSPC_RULE_CATEGORY_ID) VALUES ( #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lspc_rule_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_rule_description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_rule_expression, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_rule_error_msg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{lspc_rule_created_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1, #{lspc_rule_prerequisites, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_rule_category_id, jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO EKA.LST_SPICA_CONDITION (LSPC_FORM_ID, LSPC_RULE_NAME, LSPC_CONDITION_NAME, LSPC_CONDITION_EXPRESSION, LSPC_CONDITION_DESCRIPTION, LSPC_CONDITION_CREATED_DATE, LSPC_CONDITION_CREATED_BY, LSPC_CONDITION_FLAG_ACTIVE) VALUES ( #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lspc_rule_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_condition_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_condition_expression, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_condition_description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{lspc_condition_created_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1 )

INSERT INTO EKA.LST_SPICA_LIST (LSPC_LIST_NAME, LSPC_LIST_DESCRIPTION, LSPC_LIST_SOURCE, LSPC_LIST_FIELD_NAME, LSPC_LIST_FIELD_TYPE, LSPC_LIST_CREATED_DATE, LSPC_LIST_CREATED_BY, LSPC_LIST_FLAG_ACTIVE) VALUES ( #{lspc_list_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_list_description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_list_source, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_list_field_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_list_field_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{lspc_list_created_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1 )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_SPICA_FORM_HISTORY (LSPC_FORM_ID, MSPC_FORM_HIST_PRIMARY_ATT, MSPC_FORM_HIST_TIME_STARTED, MSPC_FORM_HIST_TIME_FINISHED, MSPC_FORM_HIST_CREATED_DATE, MSPC_FORM_HIST_CREATED_BY, MSPC_FORM_HIST_RESULT, MSPC_FORM_HIST_PROCESS_NUMBER) VALUES ( #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspc_form_hist_primary_att, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mspc_form_hist_time_started, jdbcType=DATE}, #{mspc_form_hist_time_finished, jdbcType=DATE}, SYSDATE, #{mspc_form_hist_created_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspc_form_hist_result, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mspc_form_hist_process_number, jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_SPICA_FIELD_HISTORY (LSPC_FORM_ID, MSPC_FORM_HIST_PRIMARY_ATT, LSPC_FIELD_NAME, MSPC_FIELD_HIST_VALUE, MSPC_FIELD_HIST_CREATED_DATE, MSPC_FIELD_HIST_CREATED_BY, MSPC_FORM_HIST_PROCESS_NUMBER) VALUES ( #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspc_form_hist_primary_att, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_field_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mspc_field_hist_value, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{mspc_field_hist_created_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspc_form_hist_process_number, jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_SPICA_VARIABLE_HISTORY (LSPC_FORM_ID, MSPC_FORM_HIST_PRIMARY_ATT, LSPC_VARIABLE_NAME, LSPC_VARIABLE_EXPRESSION, MSPC_VARIABLE_HIST_VALUE, MSPC_VARIABLE_HIST_CREATED, MSPC_VARIABLE_HIST_CREATED_BY, MSPC_FORM_HIST_PROCESS_NUMBER) VALUES ( #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspc_form_hist_primary_att, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_variable_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_variable_expression, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mspc_variable_hist_value, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{mspc_variable_hist_created_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspc_form_hist_process_number, jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_SPICA_RULE_HISTORY (LSPC_FORM_ID, MSPC_FORM_HIST_PRIMARY_ATT, LSPC_RULE_NAME, LSPC_RULE_EXPRESSION, MSPC_RULE_HIST_RESULT, MSPC_RULE_HIST_CREATED_DATE, MSPC_RULE_HIST_CREATED_BY, LSPC_RULE_CATEGORY_ID, MSPC_FORM_HIST_PROCESS_NUMBER) VALUES ( #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspc_form_hist_primary_att, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_rule_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_rule_expression, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mspc_rule_hist_result, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{mspc_rule_hist_created_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lspc_rule_category_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspc_form_hist_process_number, jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_SPICA_CONDITION_HISTORY (LSPC_FORM_ID, MSPC_FORM_HIST_PRIMARY_ATT, LSPC_RULE_NAME, LSPC_CONDITION_NAME, LSPC_CONDITION_EXPRESSION, MSPC_CONDITION_HIST_RESULT, MSPC_CONDITION_HIST_CREATED, MSPC_CONDITION_HIST_CREATED_BY, MSPC_FORM_HIST_PROCESS_NUMBER) VALUES ( #{lspc_form_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspc_form_hist_primary_att, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_rule_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_condition_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspc_condition_expression, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mspc_condition_hist_result, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{mspc_condition_hist_created_by, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspc_form_hist_process_number, jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_POSITION_SPAJ (REG_SPAJ, MSPS_DATE, LSPD_ID, LSSP_ID, LSSA_ID, LUS_ID, MSPS_DESC) VALUES ( #{reg_spaj, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{lspd_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lssp_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lssa_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lus_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
INSERT INTO EKA.MST_CNT_POLIS (LCA_ID, LSBS_ID, MSCNP_VALUE, MSCNP_MAX) VALUES ( #{as_cab, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{as_bisnis, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ld_no, jdbcType=BIGINT}, 999999999 )

insert into eka.mst_premi_ulink ( reg_spaj, msbi_tahun_ke, msbi_premi_ke, premi_ke, line_ak, th_ak, premi, total_premi, persen_ak) values ( #{reg_spaj, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msbi_tahun_ke, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msbi_premi_ke, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{premi_ke, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{line_ak, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{th_ak, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{premi, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{total_premi, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{persen_ak, jdbcType=DOUBLE})

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_BILLING ( REG_SPAJ, MSBI_TAHUN_KE, MSBI_PREMI_KE, MSBI_BEG_DATE, MSBI_END_DATE, MSBI_DUE_DATE, MSBI_AKTIF_DATE, LKU_ID, MSBI_POLICY_COST, MSBI_HCR_POLICY_COST, MSBI_TTL_CARD_COST, MSBI_STAMP, MSBI_INPUT_DATE, MSBI_REMAIN, MSBI_PAID, MSBI_ACTIVE, MSBI_PRINT, MSBI_ADD_BILL, LUS_ID, LSPD_ID, LCA_ID, LWK_ID, MSBI_FLAG_TOPUP, LSRG_ID, MSBI_TH_BAK, MSBI_PREMI_BAK, MSBI_PERSEN_PAID, MSBI_TGL_DEBET, MSBI_NB ) VALUES ( #{reg_spaj, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msbi_tahun_ke, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msbi_premi_ke, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msbi_beg_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{msbi_end_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{msbi_due_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{msbi_aktif_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{lku_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msbi_policy_cost, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{msbi_hcr_policy_cost, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{msbi_ttl_card_cost, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{msbi_stamp, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SYSDATE, #{msbi_remain, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{msbi_paid, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msbi_active, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msbi_print, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msbi_add_bill, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lus_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lspd_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lca_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lwk_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msbi_flag_topup, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lsrg_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msbi_th_bak, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msbi_premi_bak, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msbi_persen_paid, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tgl_debet, jdbcType=DATE}, 1 )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_DET_BILLING ( SELECT REG_SPAJ, 1, 1, ROWNUM, LSBS_ID, LSDBS_NUMBER, MSPR_PREMIUM, MSPR_DISCOUNT FROM EKA.MST_PRODUCT_INSURED WHERE ( REG_SPAJ = #{reg_spaj, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND ( MSTE_INSURED_NO = 1 ) AND ( MSPR_ACTIVE = 1 ) )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_DET_BILLING ( REG_SPAJ, MSBI_TAHUN_KE, MSBI_PREMI_KE, MSDB_DET_KE, LSBS_ID, LSDBS_NUMBER, MSDB_PREMIUM, MSDB_DISCOUNT) VALUES (#{reg_spaj, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msbi_tahun_ke, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msbi_premi_ke, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msdb_det_ke, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lsbs_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lsdbs_number, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msdb_premium, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{msdb_discount, jdbcType=DOUBLE})

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_PAYMENT ( MSPA_PAYMENT_ID, LKU_ID, LSJB_ID, CLIENT_BANK, REG_SPAJ, MSDP_NUMBER, MSPA_NO_REK, MSPA_PAY_DATE, MSPA_DUE_DATE, MSPA_DATE_BOOK, MSPA_PAYMENT, MSPA_INPUT_DATE, MSPA_OLD_POLICY, MSPA_DESC, LUS_ID, LSREK_ID, MSPA_NO_PRE, MSPA_JURNAL, MSPA_NILAI_KURS, MSPA_NO_VOUCHER, MSPA_ACTIVE, MSPA_FLAG_MERCHANT ) VALUES ( #{mspa_payment_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lku_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lsjb_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{client_bank, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reg_spaj, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msdp_number, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspa_no_rek, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mspa_pay_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{mspa_due_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{mspa_date_book, jdbcType=DATE}, #{mspa_payment, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mspa_input_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{mspa_old_policy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mspa_desc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lus_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lsrek_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspa_no_pre, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mspa_jurnal, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspa_nilai_kurs, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mspa_no_voucher, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mspa_active, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mspa_flag_merchant, jdbcType=INTEGER})

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_TAG_PAYMENT ( REG_SPAJ, MSBI_TAHUN_KE, MSBI_PREMI_KE, MSTP_VALUE, MSPA_PAYMENT_ID ) VALUES ( #{reg_spaj, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msbi_tahun_ke, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msbi_premi_ke, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mstp_value, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mspa_payment_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
